low.description: Passive discontent. No stated intent to act.
low.action: Log and archive. No escalation required.

medium.description: Active criticism with potential for organization. Author expresses intent to mobilize others.
medium.action: Flag for regional monitoring. Add to watchlist. Restrict travel permit renewal.

high.description: Direct calls to action. Author states intent to organize, protest, or distribute material.
high.action: Immediate referral to District Security Bureau. Recommend preventive detention pending review. Suspend digital access.
